setwd("C:/Users/K1525058/IdeaProjects/DataScience/data")
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "C:/Users/K1525058/IdeaProjects/DataScience/data")
Candy.df <- read.csv("CandyRaw.csv", header = T)
Candy.df$Cardboard <- ifelse(Candy.df$Box == "plastic", 0, 1)
Cardboard.df <- Candy.df[Candy.df$Cardboard == 1, c(1, 2, 4)]
Plastic.df <- Candy.df[Candy.df$Cardboard == 0, c(1, 2, 4)]
Cardboard.df$LogLength <- log(Cardboard.df$Length)
Cardboard.df$LogWidth <- log(Cardboard.df$Length)
library(leaps)
out<-summary(regsubsets(Candy~. + I(Length * Width) + I(LogLength * LogWidth) + I(Length ^ 2) + I(Width ^ 2) + I(Length ^ Width) + I(sin(Length)) + I(cos(Length)) + I(sin(Width)) + I(cos(Width)) + I(sin(LogWidth)) + I(cos(LogWidth)) + I(tan(LogLength)) + I(floor(Length / Width * 100)) + I(log(log(Length))) + I(1/sin(LogWidth)) + I(sin(1/Length)) + I (1/Width) + I(Width/Length) + I(tan(Length + Width)) + I(factorial(LogLength)/Length) + I(LogLength * LogWidth) + I(log(Width + Length)) + I(Width ^ Length) + I(Width ^ LogLength) + I(LogLength ^ Length) + I(Length ^ LogLength) + I(exp(Length)) + I(LogLength ^ LogWidth) + I(Width ^ LogWidth) + I(factorial(LogWidth)) + I(sinh(LogWidth)) + I(asin(LogLength/max(LogLength))) + I(atan(Length)),nbest=2,data=Cardboard.df)) #named the summary so that we can call parts of it easily
Subsets<-out$which #tells us which subsets are used (T/F)
R2<-round(100*out$rsq,1) #storing a list of all R2 percentages
R2adj<-round(100*out$adjr2,1) #storing a list of all R2adj percentages
Cp<-round(out$cp,1) #storing a list of all Mallows' Cp values
cbind(Subsets,R2,R2adj,Cp) #output a dataframe showing all the info we just collected
